sections.heading: Incident‑Response Life Cycle Overview
sections.body:
Incident‑Response Life Cycle Overview

This section introduces the five phases defined by NIST SP 800‑61: Preparation, Detection & Analysis, Containment, Eradication & Recovery, and Post‑Incident Activity.

sections.heading: Ransomware‑Specific Steps
sections.body:
Ransomware‑Specific Steps

  1. Identify infection vector
  2. Isolate affected systems
  3. Preserve volatile evidence
  4. Perform forensic imaging
  5. Decrypt or restore from backups
  6. Communicate with stakeholders
  7. Conduct root‑cause analysis
  8. Update defenses
  9. Document lessons learned

sections.heading: Post‑Incident Review
sections.body:
Post‑Incident Review

Review what happened, update policies, and run a tabletop exercise.
